t: With 365 over, Whole Foods cements its future as Amazon's house brand | New Food Economy
s: January 14, 2020 - According to an internal memo obtained by Yahoo, Whole Foods CEO John Mackey said that the company would discontinue the concept, while keeping the 12 existing 365 stores open. His reasoning? t: What’s Next For The Whole Foods Market Brand?
s: April 20, 2020 - Think Courtyard by Marriott or Fairfield by Marriott. With this increased focus on building the core Whole Foods Market brand into a more powerful core brand, we can expect more changes. Perhaps there will be other brands sharing in the authority of Whole Foods Market. Or, perhaps Whole Foods Market becomes a powerful master brand with a portfolio of brands like 365.
